RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the Center: Judge Ricardo Garcia Regional Detention Center

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas: state where the juvenile court is located
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas Juvenile Justice Department: department to which J.M.E. was committed for an indeterminate term, not to exceed his nineteenth birthday
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Judge Ricardo Garcia Regional Detention: detention center where J.M.E. was placed and also referred to as 'the Center', had issues with J.M.E. not participating in counseling sessions and initiating fights, and where he was unsuccessfully discharged
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Webb County Jail: location where J.M.E. was transferred after assaulting another juvenile
